🌞 Discover FOR REC's solutions to recycle photovoltaic panels! 

As solar energy increases, so does the need for efficient handling of end-of-life photovoltaic panels.
FOR REC meets this need with tailor-made plants designed to ensure optimal separation of components and reduce processing times.

Main features of the FOR REC plants:
✔ Full panel treatment: our lines accept whole solar panels, setting up an efficient separation process;
✔Material separation: we recover aluminium from frames, magnetic metals, inert fraction, ethylene vinyl acetate and non-magnetic metals from harnesses and connectors.
✔ High production capacity: our plants process up to 6 tonnes/hour thanks to advanced hydraulic grinders and separation systems.

Discover our cutting-edge solutions for photovoltaic panel recycling 👉 https://lnkd.in/d_NHvAPe 

#Forrec #IndustrialRecycling #CircularEconomy #SolarEnergy🌞 Discover FOR REC's solutions to recycle photovoltaic panels!

✔ High production capacity: our plants process up to 6 tonnes/hour thanks to advanced hydraulic grinders and separation systems.

Discover our cutting-edge solutions for photovoltaic panel recycling 👉 https://lnkd.in/d_NHvAPe 

#Forrec #IndustrialRecycling #CircularEconomy #SolarEnergy

♻️ Give new life to tires! Thanks to FORREC’s advanced plant and the collaboration with Telford Smith, recycling becomes a real opportunity. 🚀🔄 Turning waste into opportunity! The FORREC Tyre Recycling Plant processes up to 6,000kg of tyres per hour, creating materials for industries while supporting Australia’s circular economy. 💡🌍 

Partner with Telford Smith, the supplier of Forrec, for tailored recycling solutions that make a difference. 🚀 Click on the link to find out more: https://lnkd.in/gAVfHe2J

We are thrilled to be part of one of the leading global events focused on renewable energy and sustainable innovation. Come visit us at Hall 2, Stand 2330 to discover our advanced waste treatment solutions and learn how we can support your business with cutting-edge technology.

🌟 Proud to Be Part of the Italian Chamber of Commerce in Colombia! 🇮🇹🇨🇴
We are thrilled to announce that FOR REC SPA is officially affiliated with the Italian Chamber of Commerce in Colombia. This partnership reflects our commitment to strengthening ties between Italy and Colombia and growing within an international network of excellence.
👉 Starting in 2025, we will proudly display the Chamber's Seal of Affiliation, symbolizing trust and quality.
We are grateful for this opportunity and look forward to continuing this fruitful collaboration! 🙌
🔗 #FORRECSPA #ItalianChamberColombia #InternationalPartnerships #BusinessExcellence
_____________________________________________________________________________

🌟 Orgullosos de ser parte de la Cámara de Comercio Italiana en Colombia! 🇮🇹🇨🇴
Nos complace anunciar que FOR REC SPA forma parte oficialmente de la Cámara de Comercio Italiana para Colombia. Esta alianza refleja nuestro compromiso con fortalecer los lazos entre Italia y Colombia, creciendo dentro de una red internacional de excelencia.
👉 A partir de 2025, luciremos con orgullo el Sello de Afiliación de la Cámara, símbolo de confianza y calidad.
Estamos agradecidos por esta oportunidad y esperamos continuar con esta colaboración tan fructífera. 🙌
🔗 #FORRECSPA #CámaraItalianaColombia #AlianzasInternacionales #ExcelenciaEmpresarial🌟 Proud to Be Part of the Italian Chamber of Commerce in Colombia! 🇮🇹🇨🇴

India’s recycling sector is now increasingly attracting the attention of international machinery suppliers such as FOR REC S.P.A.. 

While the Indian government is tightening recycling norms by implementing EPR for various sectors global machinery suppliers are strengthening their presence by appointing local representatives.

Italian based FOR REC S.P.A., operates through a Delhi based representative Nordseewerke India Private Limited. A company promoting recycling plant machinery for the last 15 years. 

The full article can be accessed via our website (Link in comments) 

#TyreRecycling #TyreRecyclingMachinery #Machinery #BusinessGrowth #IndiaBusiness #SustainabilityAsia #Sustainability #FORRECIndia’s recycling sector is now increasingly attracting the attention of international machinery suppliers such as FOR REC S.P.A.. 

While the Indian government is tightening recycling norms by implementing EPR for various sectors global machinery suppliers are strengthening their presence by appointing local representatives.

🌍 Expanding Recycling Solutions in India! 🇮🇳
Forrec is excited to contribute to sustainable growth in India, where the emphasis on a circular economy is stronger than ever. By providing advanced systems for End-of-Life Tyre (ELT) recycling, Forrec supports the Indian market in its journey toward environmental sustainability.
Our solutions are tailored to address the growing demand for efficient recycling technologies in a market poised for transformation under initiatives like Extended Producer Responsibility (EPR). Together, we can make recycling not just a necessity but an opportunity for innovation and growth.
Discover how Forrec is shaping the future of recycling globally.
#Forrec #RecyclingSolutions #Sustainability #India #CircularEconomy

🚀 We are excited to bring you a new digital experience with the launch of our updated website!

The new website offers a comprehensive preview of our recycling lines, making it easier than ever to understand our innovative processes.
Indeed, with this update we wanted to revolutionize the user experience by offering:
✔ Accurate explanation of the structure of our plants;
✔ Detailed renderings and complete overview of the waste treatment process;
✔ Full preview of the materials you will be able to process, including complex wastes such as photovoltaic panels.

Visit our new website and learn how FOR REC continues to lead the way in sustainable solutions for a greener future 👉 https://lnkd.in/d7NdxkSA

🌍 Get ready for ECOMONDO 2024!
We are excited to announce that we will attend the international trade fair dedicated to the world of environmental innovation and the circular economy.

📅 SAVE THE DATE
We look forward to seeing you at ECOMONDO - ITALIAN EXHIBITION GROUP from November 5 to 8 at the Rimini Exhibition Center, Italy.

✔ Why should you visit our booth?
Our latest news regards the new Z16 hammer mill: designed to offer more power and efficiency, this machine is perfect for processing WEEE, washing machines, aluminum scraps and motors up to 40 kg with no need for pre-shredding.
Don't miss your chance to see it!

In the meantime, you can find out all its technical features here: 
https://lnkd.in/gCbrZh34
We are waiting for you at booth A1 - stand 203-102!

#Ecomondo2024 #GreenEconomy #SustainableInnovation #WasteManagement

🚀 Exciting News! 🚀
We at FOR REC S.P.A. are thrilled to share in the satisfaction of seeing TZR Recycling Industry's brand-new headquarters come to life, fully equipped with state-of-the-art machinery and optimized production spaces.
This project, born from a successful collaboration between Forrec and TZR, marks an important milestone for both companies. It's not just about innovation, but also about setting new standards for efficiency and international competitiveness.
We look forward to the continued success of this partnership and the opportunities it will create!
#Forrec #TZR #Innovation #Efficiency #Competitiveness #NewHeadquarters

🌍 Sustainable recycling for a greener future 🌍
FOR REC is committed to protecting the environment by developing innovative recycling solutions that maximize efficiency and reduce waste.

🔌 However, as the volume of WEEE and photovoltaic panels increases, the need for advanced recycling methods is more pressing than ever.
For this reason, FOR REC has designed a tailor-made recycling line that effectively separates key components, ensuring optimal material recovery and environmental responsibility.
With our modular recycling facilities, we aim to provide high-performance solutions that promote #sustainability and reduce treatment costs.

Have we intrigued you? Learn more about our WEEE and photovoltaic recycling solutions 👉 https://lnkd.in/e4GCTvuX

#Innovation #WasteManagement #Recycling

♻ NOVACERO S.A. presented the first plant for the treatment of scrap from metal processing in steel mills that enables total recovery of materials 
FOR REC S.P.A. is proud to have designed and supplied this system and thanks all the staff at NOVACERO for their collaboration

En Novacero, estamos comprometidos con construir un futuro más sostenible para Ecuador y el mundo.

Con la reciente inauguración de nuestra Planta Recuperadora de Residuos, estamos dando un paso significativo en esa dirección.
Esta planta, que transforma residuos en materia prima útil para diversas industrias, representa nuestra firme apuesta por la transformación sostenible.

Al evitar que más de 12 mil toneladas anuales de desechos se conviertan en basura, estamos contribuyendo activamente a la reducción de la contaminación y al cuidado del medio ambiente.

Nuestro compromiso ambiental es un pilar fundamental en todas nuestras operaciones, y esta planta es un claro ejemplo de ello.

Juntos, estamos construyendo un futuro más limpio y próspero. 💚🌍

#Novacero #Sostenibilidad #CompromisoAmbiental

♻️ Turning waste into assets: the value of industrial recycling!

Every day, thousands of tonnes of potentially recoverable materials become industrial waste.
What if we turned this waste into new opportunities?

FOR REC designs and develops innovative plants for the treatment of plastic, aluminium, photovoltaic panels, WEEE and more, converting waste into valuable raw materials.
Choosing industrial recycling means:
✅ Reducing environmental impact;
✅ Optimise production costs;
✅ Making a concrete contribution to the circular economy.

With FOR REC plants you can upgrade your industrial waste, giving it a second life. Find out how to turn your waste into valuable resources ➡️ https://lnkd.in/dMu_Fevj

#Forrec #IndustrialRecycling #CircularEconomy #Sustainability

♻️ MSW: from urban waste to new value with FOR REC!

Did you know that it is possible to recover many valuable raw materials from Municipal Solid Waste (MSW)?
With the FOR REC recycling lines you can valorise waste materials into a concrete opportunity for your company! How?
Our recycling lines are designed to recover raw materials, while the non-recyclable dry fraction can be processed to produce Residual Derived Fuel (RDF).
🚀 A unique way to generate additional value from material destined for disposal!

📌 Come and discover all FOR REC solutions at the RESIDUOS EXPO! We look forward to seeing you in Mexico City from 25 to 27 March.

🔌 Are you considering the purchase of a recycling plant, but afraid of making a blind investment?

We know that choosing industrial machinery is an important decision. 
That's why FOR REC has installed a complete and working plant at its headquarter in Italy, dedicated to the recycling of electric wires and motors.
You will be able to directly see the performance of this machinery, test it personally and see for yourself the quality of the end result before you invest.

👉 Choose the security of a conscious investment!

♻️ High-performance recycling for WEEE, electric motors and photovoltaic panels 

At FOR REC, we don’t just design recycling systems: we build high-performing solutions tailored to the real needs of your industry.
Our latest blog article takes you inside the world of WEEE treatment, with a special focus on a recent installation in Northern Italy, where our advanced technology enabled the client to process a large volume of waste in record time.

Thanks to a totally custom recycling line, the company is now able to perfectly separate materials such as plastics, non-magnetic metals and ferrous fraction by processing up to 2 tons of material per hour.
👉 Do you want to discover more? Read more here: https://lnkd.in/djQ6m6BR

♻️ Refrigerators and boilers: complex waste, smart solutions!

Recycling refrigerators and boilers is no simple task. These appliances contain insulating gases, plastics, metals, and other components that require precision and safety during treatment.

At FOR REC, we’ve developed turnkey systems capable of handling the complexity of these materials. Our technologies ensure:
✅ Safe removal of harmful substances;
✅ Efficient separation of metals, plastics, and polyurethane;
✅ Compliance with international environmental standards.

Whether you’re facing the challenges of WEEE regulations or looking to improve your plant’s performance, FOR REC provides customized and scalable solutions to make refrigerator and boiler recycling cleaner, safer, and more efficient.

Discover more about our specialized systems: https://lnkd.in/dF2S5DkF

♻️ Recycling is not just a necessity: it’s a responsibility.

At FOR REC, we believe that efficient waste management is key to building a sustainable future. That’s why we design and build fully customized industrial recycling lines, tailored to each client’s specific needs.

Whether you’re treating WEEE, metals, plastics, wood, or end-of-life products, FOR REC delivers:
🔧 Turnkey solutions engineered for your materials and capacity;
📈 Modular systems designed to grow with your business;
🌍 Reliable performance that supports environmental goals and compliance.

From first analysis to installation and after-sales, we partner with companies worldwide to turn waste into valuable resources — efficiently, safely, and with precision.

👉 Learn more about our custom recycling solutions: https://lnkd.in/dhsGNM49

#FORREC #Recycling #CustomSolutions #IndustrialRecycling #WasteManagement
